data.actual_result: You can use the Transfer ownership option at bots (the option does nothing. the bots do not receive ownership)
data.expected_result: You shouldn't be able to have this option (transferring ownership to a bot)
data.short_description: Option of transferring server ownership to bots is available
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you own a server (or create a new one for a test) - Invite a bot (if you don't have one already in server) - Go to server settings, members section, select the bot, scroll down and use the "Transfer Ownership" option - Observe
